FuncDef: This command is used to bind a key group to a router interface for inbound or outbound packet processing. When configured in the outbound direction, packets egressing the router use theactive-outbound-saassociated with the configured key group. When configured in the inbound direction, received packets must be encrypted using one of the valid security associations configured for the key group.

ParaDef.Info: The ID number of the key group being configured. Values-1 to 127, keygroup-name (64 characters maximum).
Binds the key group in the inbound direction.
Binds the key group in the outbound direction.

ExtraInfo: Default: no encryption-keygroup direction inboundno encryption-keygroup direction outbound
